document_data.name: ''Amulet of Protection''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Amulets of protection''''' were [[enchanted]] [[amulet]]s that offered physical protection to their wearers.
document_data.Powers: ''Amulets of protection'' were created in several power levels. They surrounded the wearer with an invisible magical barrier that deflected some of the incoming attacks and improved the wearer's chances of avoiding harm through physical and magical means.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, a [[halfling]] [[bard|"bard"]] [[Olive Ruskettle]] and her partner [[Jade]] occasionally ran a scam in the city of [[Immersea]]. They claimed that an unsightly item was an ''amulet of protection'' and convinced unwitting nobles to purchase it for a hefty price. The same scam came in handy when the scion of [[House Wyvernspur]], [[Giogioni Wyvernspur|Giogioni]] faced the family's dark secret - an evil spellcaster [[Flattery Wyvernspur]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Elytharra Dinnesmore]], [[half-elven]] [[enchantress]] of [[Targos]], [[Ten Towns]], active ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1312}}.
*[[Felibarr Blacklance]], a bounty hunter and [[assassin]] from [[Waterdeep]], active in the 1350's [[DR]].
*[[Preybelish]], a [[dark naga]] amulet collector from the [[Dwarven Dungeons]] of [[Myth Drannor]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
